ygData.subject: Ambush
ygData.msgSnippet: Can someone explain this whole Megaton thing to me? Who is he, and what side is he on? Tankkor, with the bot on him, sending bolts of electricity through him,

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

       Can someone explain this whole Megaton thing to me? Who is he, and 
what side is he on?

       Tankkor, with the bot on him, sending bolts of electricity through 
him, suddenly transforms into his bot mode, sending Endbringer rolling away 
from him. As smoke rises out of his armor, Tankkor begins a slow march towrds 
endbringer, with a slight limp. He raises his right arm and shoots out a 
series of pulses at Endbringer, while his internal computer calculates its 
next move.

       Paralysis now inhales this bots very spark. He is so close he can 
taste the exhaust overload from his mech pump. There, suddenly, he see's a 
whif of the exhaust in midair. In the cold of the artic it appeared to be 
steam. At least it gave him a chance at this invisable foe.
       "Scather, I should have known." He said, with intense reptilian eyes 
locked on the small exhaust that came and dissloved every few moment. He 
would have to be quick, He didnt know what the invisable bot was holding.
       With as much quickness as he could produce, Paralysis ripped his 
pistol from his holster and fired three shots at the exhaust, and then 
bracing himself for wahtever Scather was going to throw back at him.

       Rampage yelled in pain as the claws sunk in, his arms released the 
legs and now he used his crab legs mounted on his back to stab the larger 
bots claw. Wriggling hard, Rampage looked at his missle launcher only a few 
feet away.
       Inferno dove down, and kicked it over to the crab, still in the bizzar 
dance with the enemy. He gave his hoarse laugh and sent several fire balls at 
the bot as Ramapge fianally grasped his weapon.


       Megatron watched the icons from the 3 demensional map. He was going to 
send reinforcements, Aerostreak and Quasar prehaps...
       "Quasar, do you think you could help with our current situation?"

       Hell Beast and Gremlin made the returning trip from the large lake. 
They had recived Megatrons message of the ambush, and as they trudged trhough 
the snow, stumbling on it wouldnt be hard. In the distance they saw the 
lights of the crossfire, and looking at Gremlin Hell Beast nodded.
       "Load your pistol. We might as well help out, seeing as if we dont 
they mountian base is the next target."
       Guns ready they moved forward to engage.

--part1_11.d1f3137.276bb6b6_boundary
